name: Officer Taylor
descriptions: Officer Taylor is a member of Vault 101 security in 2277.
Officer Taylor is a senior member of the Vault 101 security team. After his beloved wife's death, he blames the reckless escapees for the stress it caused her.
Officer Taylor was married to Agnes Taylor.

Trouble on the Homefront: Taylor is the second security guard the Lone Wander encounters when reentering the vault. Although he blames the Lone Wanderer and James for the problems in Vault 101, he is not hostile.

I didn't mean to fire, I really didn't. I just wanted to scare him off! But he had a knife! conversation.response_text: You know I can't do that, Freddie. Now get back down below, before I have to do something we'll both regret.{Afraid, but holding his ground}Play soundFO3 Taylor KnowICantDoThat.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Taylor_KnowICantDoThat.oggnoicon
